name: Awesome Burger Shop Fast Food Barbeque Maker - Cooking games
name_original: Awesome Burger Shop Fast Food Barbeque Maker - Cooking games
description:
Who's ready to make some Burgers!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite cheese burger recipes. Play now!

Features:
- Drag and grind meat
- Mix together ingredients for your meat patty
- Cut your potatos to french fries
- Many toppings to choose from: Cheeses, Veggies, Sauces, Buns
- EAT IT ONCE! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Toppings
- Different combinations!
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself.

Download this game right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.

Private Policy:
